**"The Island of Lost Things"**: A surreal, slow-burning drama that takes place on a mysterious island where lost objects from throughout history have washed up. Each episode focuses on a different character, who arrives on the island in search of a lost loved one or a lost part of themselves. As they navigate the island's ever-changing landscape, they uncover the secrets of the objects and the people who lost them, leading to a deeper understanding of themselves and the world around them.

**"The Department of Lost Time"**: A time-traveling adventure series that follows a team of agents working for a secret government agency tasked with collecting lost time from throughout history. Each episode takes the team to a different era, where they must navigate the complexities of the past and collect fragments of lost time that have been scattered across the timeline. As they collect more time, they begin to unravel a larger conspiracy that threatens the fabric of reality.

**"The Memory Merchant"**: A fantasy drama series that follows a young woman who discovers she has the ability to extract, store, and sell memories. As she becomes embroiled in a world of memory traders and collectors, she must navigate the complexities of memory ownership and the true cost of selling one's experiences. Each episode focuses on a different memory and the person who sold it, exploring the impact of memory on identity and relationships.

**"The Library of Lost Knowledge"**: A sci-fi mystery series set in a vast, underground library that contains every piece of knowledge ever lost to human history. A group of librarians, each with their own unique skills and motivations, must navigate the labyrinthine shelves to uncover the secrets of the library and prevent a catastrophic event that threatens to erase human knowledge forever. Each episode delves into a different section of the library, uncovering hidden truths and conspiracies.

**"The Atlas of Lost Places"**: A documentary-style series that follows a team of explorers as they travel to forgotten and abandoned places around the world. From ghost towns to abandoned cities, each episode delves into the history and mythology of a different location, uncovering the stories of the people who once lived there and the reasons why they left. As the team explores these lost places, they begin to uncover a larger narrative about the human experience and the impact of progress on our collective memory.
